name: X System 2
overview: A multi-genre game featuring game sections of Avoid-it, Shooter Platforming areas. and Avoid the asteroids, your shuttle may feel bulky but it is nimble and a good pilot should be able to avoid the deadly bodies and transfer to the where you can fight the Borg Defense ship, blast it as quickly as possible and avoid damage. Then board the ship and find your way to the bridge level collecting disks.
